Name: For Food Sake! VR
About the game: Have you ever wonder what is it feel like to work in a food factory where you are forced to sort healthy and unhealthy food? This game has got you covered. -Growing difficulty: as the game go it will get faster and faster, you won't have time to react! -BOOM!: Sometimes the bomb factory next door will send in some surprise during your work, don't let it send your foods flying! -Action packed: as the game gets harder, you will feel like a ninja master throwing foods and tossing bombs! -Keeps record: you can see your highest payout and highest level reached on the score board! What are you waiting for? Join the factory! For food sake!
